title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Me_%26_Roboco
transformers_text:
Me & Roboco ( Japanese : 僕とロボコ , Hepburn : Boku to Roboko ) is a Japanese manga series written and illustrated by Shuhei Miyazaki. It has been serialized in Shueisha 's Weekly Shōnen Jump since July 2020. The series is published digitally in English language by Viz Media . A 28-episode anime television series adaptation produced by Gallop was broadcast on TV Tokyo from December 2022 to June 2023. An anime film adaptation premiered in April 2025.

Set in a future where every household owns maid robots known as OrderMaids, average grade-schooler Bondo Taira dreams of having his very own robot because his friends, Gachi Gorilla and Motsuo Kaneo, always brag about Kaneo's OrderMaid, Meico. With some convincing, Bondo manages to make his mom agree and get them one, but what he receives is an unable-to-compute maid named Roboco, the most powerful clumsy maid ever created. With Roboco's arrival, Bondo's life starts to get a whole lot weirder.

Written and illustrated by Shuhei Miyazaki, Me & Roboco started in Shueisha 's shōnen manga magazine Weekly Shōnen Jump on July 6, 2020. [ 7 ] [ 8 ] Shueisha has collected its chapters into individual tankōbon volumes. The first volume (whose cover is a parody of the first Doraemon volume) [ 9 ] was released on November 4, 2020. [ 10 ] As of November 4, 2025, twenty-four volumes have been released. [ 11 ]

The series is published digitally in English language by Viz Media . [ 12 ] In July 2021, Viz Media announced that they would published the volumes digitally; [ 13 ] the first volume was released on October 26, 2021. [ 14 ]

In May 2022, it was announced that the series would be adapted into an anime television series. [ 55 ] The series is produced by Gallop , and directed by Akitaro Daichi , with Michihiro Sato serving as assistant director, Sayuri Ooba overseeing the series' scripts, and Yūko Ebara designing the characters. It was broadcast for 28 episodes from December 5, 2022, to June 19, 2023, on TV Tokyo and its affiliates, and consists of five-minute episodes. [ 56 ] [ 57 ] The theme song is "lol" by Gang Parade . [ 3 ] Crunchyroll streamed the series outside of Asia. [ 58 ]

A film adaptation was announced in June 2023. [ 59 ] [ 60 ] It was later announced to be an anime film. It was planned to premiere in Q4 2024; however, it was delayed to improve the film's quality, and premiered on April 18, 2025. [ 61 ] [ 62 ] The film's theme song is "Lolilokkyun Robo" ( ロりロっきゅんロぼ♡ , Rorirokkiyun Robo ) , performed by Ano . [ 63 ]

In July 2022, a live-action project was announced. [ 64 ] It was later revealed to be a collaboration with cosplayer Enako , and a Roboco figure produced by Sentinel Co., Ltd. as part of its Riobot series of figurines. [ 65 ] [ 66 ]

Me & Roboco was nominated for the Best Printed Manga category in the 2021 Next Manga Awards and placed thirteenth out of 50 nominees. [ 67 ] The series ranked eleventh on the Nationwide Bookstore Employees' Recommended Comics of 2022. [ 68 ]
